title: IoT Data Lake Implementation
challenge: Client lacked the ability to process and analyze sensor data from connected vehicles.
solution: Evasion Tech created a data lake using AWS S3, Glue, and Redshift, paired with real-time analytics pipelines.
detailed_solution: Evasion Tech started with designing a scalable architecture for ingesting billions of IoT signals daily. AWS S3 served as the data lake backbone, while Glue performed ETL transformations. Redshift enabled advanced analytics on structured datasets. A Kafka-based streaming pipeline was implemented for real-time event processing. Secure APIs provided insights back to vehicle dashboards and partner applications. The project unlocked new opportunities in predictive maintenance and driver assistance systems.
outcome: Enabled predictive maintenance and enhanced driver safety features.
long_term_impact: Generated a new revenue stream from data-driven services.
